title: Chatter Natter 4: Rob Langham
itunes:title: Chatter Natter 4: Rob Langham
itunes:subtitle: In the latest episode of Chatter Natter, Pete and Gary speak to historian Rob Langham. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Guest: Rob Langham Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or subscribe to our...
description:
In the latest episode of Chatter Natter, Pete and Gary speak to historian Rob Langham.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Guest: Rob Langham Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
